interestingcomments.content:
Can you recommend a casual camera bag / day bag for travel that won't kill my shoulders? /!/ I'm personally not a fan of backpacks while traveling abroad. I'm very petite so they usually overtake my small frame, plus I like to be able to keep a good eye on my belongings.

I usually just carry a medium size purse with my Nikon D40, water bottle, protein bar, passport stuff, and some maps, but this setup is not sustainable. My shoulders get pretty sore after a few hours. Any recommendations are helpful! Thanks!

interestingcomments.content: Depth Measurement with Tara USB Stereo Camera at 50fps in NVIDIA Jetson TX2 /!/  A demo of depth measurement with Tara USB Stereo Camera in NVIDIA®  Jetson TX2 (Cuda Accelerated). GPU accelerated depth map at 50fps.  Tara is a UVC- compliant 3D Stereo camera based on MT9V024 stereo sensor from ON Semiconductor.
